Keywords: Assassin , Femizons , Hellions , Marauders , Soldier
Real Name: Philippa Sontag
Special Powers
RALLY (5): Opposing Attack Rolls. When Arclight uses Quake, she may replace a die in the attack roll with her RALLY die. (RALLY: Once per roll for each die in a finalized attack roll and for all characters with a matching RALLY die and trait color printed under their trait star, after resolutions you may choose a friendly character to gain a matching RALLY die. RALLY trait colors specify which attack type they can gain RALLY dies from. BLUE = Friendly Attack Rolls. RED = Opposing Attack Rolls. GREEN = All Attack Rolls. When a character gains a RALLY die, place a die with the matching result on their card.)
SHOCKWAVE SLAM: Quake. // When Arclight hits a single opposing character with a close attack -or- uses CLOSE destroy, after resolutions, he can use Quake as FREE.

Comments
November 22, 2021
tyroclix
WIN/LOSS: 2-1 I dig Arclight. I was reading comics regularly when she appeared in the Mutant Massacre storyline and I have enjoyed this underdog - even though she has appeared in 3 heroclix sets! The newest version is a load of fun especially vs the POG generators and Leadership call-ins we are immersed in currently. Important to remember she needs to target 1 character (or destroy) to get the Quake as FREE as I messed that up which cost me a game. Straight forward design, I like her ability to bust formations at a cheap cost.
September 28, 2021
hoojeebo
I mean, she was in a couple of issues of Hellions, but she was never a member of the team, and Scalphunter even ended up killing her. Odd keyword choice.
August 11, 2021
Goop
Quake has always been a bit of a situational power anyway. So with this fig you can double quake or just attack and quake provided the first hits... which it will if you use your rally die. I suppose if you love using quake you'll like this fig but i'm just not into it.
